Translations.Text: potana sarvocca palanaharana namani pavitrata bayana kara
jene sarjana karyu ane thika-thaka karyo
ane jene (thika-thaka) bhagya banavyum ane pachi marga batavyo
ane jene taji vanaspati'o upajavi
pachi tene tene (sukavine) kalo kacaro banavi didho
ame tamane padhavisu pachi tame nahim bhulo
sivaya je kami allaha icche, te jahera ane chupi (vatone pana) jane che
Ame tamara mate saralata peda kari da'isum
to tame sikhamana apata raho, jo sikhamana labhadayaka hoya
daravavalo to sikhamana grahana karase
(ha) durbhagi tenathi dura rahese
je moti agamam jase
tyam na to te mrtyu pamase na to jivase. (Jana-kanini avasthamam hase)
kharekhara tene saphalata prapta kari je pavitra tha'i gayo
ane jene potana palanaharana namanum smarana karyu, ane namajha padhato rahyo
parantu tame to duniyavi jivanane prathamikata apo cho
ane akhirata sarvottama ane avinasi che
a vato prathama granthomam pana che
(etale ke) ibrahima ane musana granthomam
sum tamane pana dhanki denari (kayamata) ni vata pahonci che
te divase ketalaya cahera apamanita hase
(ane) parisrama karanara thakela hase
te'o dhagadhagati agamam jase
atisaya ukalata jharananum pani te'one pivadavavamam avase
temana mate kantavala suka ghasa sivaya kami khannu nahim hoya
je na hrstaprsta karase ane na bhukha dura karase
ketalaya cahera te divase tajagibharya ane (khusahala) hase
potana prayatnothi khusa hase
uccasreni ni jannatamam hase
temam ko'i bakavasa nahi sambhale
temam eka vahetu jharanum hase
(ane) temam unca-unca asana hase
temam pyala mukela (hase)
ane eka kataramam lagela takiya hase
ane makhamali jajamo phelayeli hase
sum te'o untone nathi jo'i rahya ke te ka'i rite peda karavamam avya che
ane akasane ke ka'i rite uncu karavamam avyum che
ane parvato tarapha te ka'i rite khodi devamam avya che
ane dharati tarapha ke ka'i rite patharavamam avi che
Basa tame sikhamana apata raho. (Karanake) tame phakata sikhamana apanara cho
tame temana upara rakhevala nathi
ha! Je vyakti modhum pheravase ane inkara karase
tene allaha ta'ala bhare saja apase
cokkasapane amara tarapha ja temane pacha pharavanum che
pachi cokkasapane amara sire che, temano hisaba levo
soganda che vaheli parodhana
ane dasa ratri'ona
ane yugma ane visamana
ane ratrina, jyare java lage
sum amam budhdhisali mate ko'i soganda che
sum tame na joyum ke tamara palanahare adi'o sathe kevo vartava karyo
stambhovala iramani sathe
jemana jevi (ko'i koma) duniyamam peda karavamam nathi avi
ane samudavala sathe je'o'e khinamam mota-mota pat'tharo kotarya
ane phira'auna sathe je khuntavalo hato
a badha'e saheromam mathum uncakyum hatum
ane atisaya phasada phelavyo hato
chevate tara palanahare temana para yatanano korado varasavi didho
hakikatamam taro palanahara takamam che
manusya (a sthiti che ke) teno palanahara jyare teni pariksa le che ane ijhajhata ape che, ane tene khusahali ape che, to te kaheva lage che, mara palanahare maru sanmana karyum
ane jyare te teni pariksa le che ane teni roji tanga kari de che, to te kaheva lage che ke mara palanahare marum apamana karyum
avum kadapi nahim! Parantu (vata evi che) ke tame (ja) loko anathano adara nathi karata
ane garibone khavadavava mate eka-bijane ubharata nathi
ane varasani sampatti sametine hadapa kari ja'o cho
ane dhanathi khuba prema karo cho
kadapi nahim, jyare dharati kuti-kutine barabara kari devamam avase
Ane tamaro palanahara (pote) avi jase ane pharista'o katarabandha avase
ane je divase jahannama pana lavavamam avase
e kahese ke kadaca! Mem potana a jivana mate pahela kami mokalyum hota
basa aje allahana ajhaba jevo ajhaba ko'ino nahim hoya
na tena jevi jakada ko'ini jakada hase
o santosi jiva
tum potana palanahara tarapha cala, evi rite ke tum tenathi prasanna, te tara thi prasanna
basa mara srestha banda'o mam dakhala tha'i ja
ane pravesi ja mari jannatamam
